text: Marley Eve Shelton (born April 12, 1974) is an American television and movie actress. She began her acting career in 1991. She has acted in different movie genres. She played Amanda in Grand Canyon. She also played Tricia Nixon Cox in Nixon (1995). voice roles include, Nutri Ventures, The Powerpuff Girls as additional adr voices. Shelton was born in Los Angeles, California. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Marley Shelton
